channel.title: Projects on Matt Warren
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Matt Warren

item.title: ValuesCardSort
item.description: A free and accessible web implementation of the values card sorting exercise - a widely used psychological tool for reflecting on personal values.

item.title: SortSpotify
item.description: Command-line tool for managing Spotify playlists, including filtering and sorting playlists by track tempo and key.

item.title: Monde Radio
item.description: A weekly radio show and collaborative project by friends wishing to share explore music from a wide range of styles and genres.

item.title: Century Science
item.description: My first website – a platform aimed at exploring my personal interests and ideas, and sparking conversations about science and technology.
